front.title: Japanese characters in Internationalized Domain Name labels

abstract.t: Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) makes expression of domain namerich. The demand for such enrichment is to use native languagecharacters in a domain name. IDN itself has no locale dependency as aprotocol, but to utilize IDN in the real world, language and/orregional aspects should be taken into account.This document explains a guideline to any IDN zone administrator whoaccepts Japanese as an IDN label.
